Name: The falling tower
About the game: Welcome to this magic world, Hero. Explore this world and make your own decision. -----What’s your purpose when you come to this magic world. (Press Arrow Keys to move, Z and X Keys to confirm / cancel or Open Menu) This is a rpg maker game telling a story about Greedy and Dedication. The game is about Attack, Defense, Hp and Puzzles. – improve your ATK and DEF to defeat the monsters in your way. Reach the top of the tower to Beat the Final Boss – The Bad Guy.And all the characters​ have their own characteristics, which means, if you are the player adjudge games seriously, you will like it. ​Happy Little Fairy, Scholars, Potion Trader, Businessman​ .etc. ​To play through this game, it will give you 5 hours Joyful and Challenging Experience. ​ Since It only cost 1$.. You will not regret for purchasing. This is my first game, and If you have any suggestions, please leave any comment below. THANKS for your PLAYING.
